function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of accurate individual health monitoring","Impact":"Delayed or incorrect medical intervention","Mitigation":"Implementing advanced health monitoring technologies and systems","Technologies":"Mobile health (mHealth) apps, wearable devices, remote monitoring systems","People":"Patients, individuals at risk","Owner":"Healthcare providers, technology developers, government"},{"Description":"Ineffective tracking of geographical spread of the virus","Impact":"Uncontrolled virus spread, delayed containment measures","Mitigation":"Utilizing advanced geographic tracking and mapping technology, implementing efficient data collection systems","Technologies":"Geographic information systems (GIS), contact tracing apps, real-time surveillance systems","People":"Population at risk, public health authorities","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, technology developers"},{"Description":"Inadequate data security of health information","Impact":"Data breaches, privacy violations, misuse of sensitive health data","Mitigation":"Implementing robust data security measures, encryption, access control, and compliance with privacy regulations","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure cloud storage, access control systems, compliance management software","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology developers, government"}]}
